LOAN_ID = #loanId#
CUSTOMER_ID = #customerId#
REFUSE_LOAN_STATE_ID = #refuseLoanStateId#

SELECT * FROM LN_LOAN_INFO WHERE 1=1

LOAN_ACCOUNT = #loanAccount#
